title: Ieneko Nora wa Oogataken ga Nigate
original_name: 家猫ノラは大型犬が苦手
sinopse:
The main character, Riku Kuyama, who had worked hard as a student after losing his parents, decided to live in a boarding house. And there is a handsome but misanthropic programmer geek, Akimichi Toosaka. In fact, he has another side to him that Riku has never imagined!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
